text: Russy was a municipality of the district Broye in the canton of Fribourg in Switzerland. On 1 January 2016, the former municipalities of Domdidier, Dompierre, Léchelles and Russy merged to form Belmont-Broye.Nomenklaturen – Amtliches Gemeindeverzeichnis der Schweiz accessed 3 February 2016 == References == ==Other websites== Category:Former municipalities of Fribourg
title: Russy, Switzerland
